title: Can we make it more punishing when champions miss their skillshots?
body:
Ahri, has skill shots and should really have to land them for her to 100-0 someone... but she doesn't. Since the change to her charm she can just ult and W and use auto target to kill the enemy.

Fizz can completely miss his ult because bad player, but 100-0 with his bleed and trickster.

If Lux was to miss her skill shot ult (which you'd have to be comatose to get hit by), her kill potential is gone.
If Viktor was to miss Death Ray, again he would  have very little kill potential.

What I don't understand is that if you say their kite as whole is a reasonable amount of damage, why can they miss their skills and still burst out their target. It means that if they do land their skills there is even less chance of you surviving.

Why do champs have these high impact skill shots if they don't need them to kill a target?

replies.body: thats because they are burst champions they need the really high damage.
So, what? you miss a skill shot you lose the health that your opponent should have lost?
